movies.title: Hacksaw Ridge
movies.plot: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, serving during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

movies.title: The Ottoman Lieutenant
movies.plot: This movie is a love story between an idealistic American nurse and a Turkish officer in World War I.

movies.title: A Private War
movies.plot: One of the most celebrated war correspondents of our time, Marie Colvin is an utterly fearless and rebellious spirit, driven to the frontline of conflicts across the globe to give voice to the voiceless.

movies.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
movies.plot: In 1936, archaeologist Indiana Jones is tasked by Army Intelligence to help locate a legendary ancient power, the Ark of Covenant, before the Nazis get it first.

movies.title: Red Cliff
movies.plot: The first chapter of a two-part story centered on a battle fought in China's Three Kingdoms period (220-280 A.D.).

movies.title: The Sum of All Fears
movies.plot: CIA analyst Jack Ryan must stop the plans of a Neo-Nazi faction that threatens to incite a catastrophic conflict between the United States and Russia by detonating a nuclear weapon at a football game in Baltimore, Maryland.

movies.title: The Promise
movies.plot: Set during the last days of the Ottoman Empire, The Promise follows a love triangle between Michael, a brilliant medical student, the beautiful and sophisticated Ana, and Chris - a renowned American journalist based in Paris.

movies.title: Thirty Seconds Over Tokyo
movies.plot: In the wake of Pearl Harbor, a young lieutenant leaves his expectant wife to volunteer for a secret bombing mission which will take the war to the Japanese homeland.

movies.title: Redbad
movies.plot: The power struggles and wars between the Frisian Redbad and his sworn enemy Pepin of Herstal, Lord of the Franks.

movies.title: Darkest Hour
movies.plot: In May 1940, the fate of World War II hangs on Winston Churchill, who must decide whether to negotiate with Adolf Hitler, or fight on knowing that it could mean the end of the British Empire.

movies.title: Dunkirk
movies.plot: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Commonwealth and Empire, and France are surrounded by the German Army and evacuated during a fierce battle in World War II.

movies.title: Predator
movies.plot: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

movies.title: Memphis Belle
movies.plot: In 1943, the crew of a B-17 based in the UK prepares for its 25th and final bombing mission over Germany before returning home to the USA.

movies.title: Triple Frontier
movies.plot: Loyalties are tested when five friends and former special forces operatives reunite to take down a South American drug lord, unleashing a chain of unintended consequences.

movies.title: USS Indianapolis: Men of Courage
movies.plot: During World War II, an American navy ship is sunk by a Japanese submarine leaving 890 crewmen stranded in shark infested waters.

movies.title: Heaven and Earth
movies.plot: In 16th century Japan, two samurai engage in massive battles across the countryside, one attempting to conquer and the other attempting to defend his land while repressing his love for a woman after taking a vow of celibacy.

movies.title: Conan the Barbarian
movies.plot: A powerful warrior seeks to avenge the genocide of his people and the murder of his parents at the hands of a snake cult.

movies.title: Flags of Our Fathers
movies.plot: The life stories of the six men who raised the flag at the Battle of Iwo Jima, a turning point in World War II.

movies.title: Paths of Glory
movies.plot: A colonel defends three of his soldiers in a court-martial after they abandon a suicidal attack.

movies.title: Black Book
movies.plot: In the Nazi-occupied Netherlands during World War II, a Jewish singer infiltrates the regional Gestapo headquarters for the Dutch resistance. Things get complicated when she falls for the enemy.

movies.title: Valkyrie
movies.plot: A dramatization of the July 20, 1944 assassination and political coup plot by desperate renegade German Army officers against Adolf Hitler during World War II.

movies.title: The Deer Hunter
movies.plot: The lives of a group of friends are forever changed by the Vietnam War.

movies.title: All Quiet on the Western Front
movies.plot: A German youth eagerly enters World War I, but his enthusiasm wanes as he gets a firsthand view of the horror.

movies.title: U-571
movies.plot: A German submarine is boarded by disguised American submariners trying to capture their Enigma cipher machine.

movies.title: Sicario
movies.plot: An idealistic FBI agent is enlisted by a government task force to aid in the escalating war against drugs at the border area between the U.S. and Mexico.

movies.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
movies.plot: A cyborg from the future, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten-year-old son John from an even more advanced and powerful cyborg.

movies.title: Starship Troopers
movies.plot: Humans, in a fascist militaristic future, wage war with giant alien bugs.

movies.title: Army of Shadows
movies.plot: An account of underground resistance fighters in Nazi-occupied France.

movies.title: Aliens
movies.plot: Decades after surviving the Nostromo incident, Ellen Ripley is sent out to re-establish contact with a terraforming colony but finds herself battling the Alien Queen and her offspring.

movies.title: Paisan
movies.plot: American military personnel interact warily with a variety of Italian locals over a year and a half in the push north during the Italian Campaign of WWII as German forces make their retreat.

movies.title: Platoon
movies.plot: Chris Taylor, a neophyte recruit in Vietnam, finds himself caught in a battle of wills between two sergeants, one good and the other evil. A shrewd examination of the brutality of war and the duality of man in conflict.

movies.title: Mongol: The Rise of Genghis Khan
movies.plot: The story recounts the early life of Genghis Khan who was a slave before going on to conquer half the world in 1206.

movies.title: The Last of the Mohicans
movies.plot: Three Mohican trappers agree to protect the daughters of a British Colonel in the midst of the French and Indian War.

movies.title: Apocalypse Now
movies.plot: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

movies.title: The Dirty Dozen
movies.plot: During World War II, a rebellious U.S. Army Major is assigned a dozen convicted murderers to train and lead them into a mass assassination mission of German officers.

movies.title: Clear and Present Danger
movies.plot: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

movies.title: The African Queen
movies.plot: In WWI East Africa, a gin-swilling Canadian riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced English missionary to undertake a trip up a treacherous river and use his boat to attack a German gunship.

movies.title: From Here to Eternity
movies.plot: At a U.S. Army base in 1941 Hawaii, a pugilistic private is cruelly punished for refusing to join his unit's boxing team. Meanwhile, his commanding officer's wife and top NCO are indulging in a torrid love affair.

movies.title: Rescue Dawn
movies.plot: A U.S. fighter pilot's epic struggle of survival after being shot down on a mission over Laos during the Vietnam War.

movies.title: The Battle of Algiers
movies.plot: In the 1950s, fear and violence escalate as the people of Algiers fight for independence from the French government.

movies.title: Glory
movies.plot: Robert Gould Shaw leads the U.S. Civil War's first all-black volunteer company, fighting prejudices from both his own Union Army, and the Confederates.

movies.title: Red Dawn
movies.plot: A group of teenagers look to save their town from an invasion of North Korean soldiers.

movies.title: Red Dawn
movies.plot: It is the dawn of World War III. In the western mountains of America, a group of teenagers band together to defend their town, and their country, from invading Soviet forces.

movies.title: Force 10 from Navarone
movies.plot: During World War II, several oddly assorted military experts are teamed in a mission to raid and destroy a bridge vital to enemy strategy.

movies.title: Three Kings
movies.plot: In the aftermath of the Persian Gulf War, four soldiers set out to steal gold that was stolen from Kuwait, but they discover people who desperately need their help.

movies.plot: A Russian and a German sniper play a game of cat-and-mouse during the Battle of Stalingrad.

movies.title: Fury
movies.plot: A grizzled tank commander makes tough decisions as he and his crew fight their way across Germany in April, 1945.

movies.title: Fires on the Plain
movies.plot: In the closing days of WWII, remnants of the Japanese army in Leyte are abandoned by their command and face certain death by starvation.
